reviews.text:
Beautiful station. However,  not enough trains,  especially on a Sunday when there are so many people. I ended up having to cycle back to Perth because there was no room on any of the trains. Some of the trains only have 3 cars too.  There is no automatic ticket machine. 

Come on ScotRail - you can do better than this.
Love this place. see the ladder, great walks and a sweet little town. Highly recommended

How can humans live with such disdain for others? That is the question I ask myself when visiting this station and interacting with the lone member of staff sitting unpleasantly behind the ticket office desk.
A lovely little town., with some nice shops.

Dont know the mans name but the guard on duty this morning(around 10.30am) was extremely helpful, our train wasnt due until 12.20 and we had our cases and a long wait he very kindly stored our cases for us so we could go and get a cuppa we were very grateful a big thank you to you
